Topic.Title: Will some hedge funds sell Apple to buy Google or other way around

Message.Msg: "Will we see a shift in holdings ?" Yes.

Message.Title: High Un-employment, No Growth, Massive Deficits...
Message.Msg: ... that's what we've been getting for the past 4 years. The Congressional Budget Office projects that these massive, $Trillion-dollar deficits will continue under Obama's policies for another 4 years if he's re-elected. I contend that we don't HAVE 4 years to get it under control... and that Obama has no plan to do it except by raising $80 billion by taxing the wealthy and sending their investment dollars scurrying offshore and into tax shelters. That $80 billion covers just 1/15 of the annual deficits... Paul Ryan's plan and the Simpson-Bowles plan cover many, many, many times Obama's daily tax-the-rich speeches. Over the past 100 years, we've seen many politicians in many countries that hammered home a hatred for the rich... ... we really need to consider how those countries fared in the wake of their success in punishing the rich... ... Castro, Marx, Mao, Chavez... histroy is replete with leaders that took a similar path and watched badly needed investment capital flee their countries as it is fleeing America and diving into tax shelters today. The only way November will turn out well is if we stop voting for the largess the government heaps onto us... ... and start voting for ours and our Children's future in an America that doesn't end up like Greece.

Topic.Title: High Un-employment, No Growth, Massive Deficits...

Message.Title: Today's Advice
Message.Msg: Don't gamble; take all your savings and buy some good stock and hold it till it goes up, then sell it. If it don't go up, don't buy it. >> Will Rogers

Message.Title: Supposing they give Qe3 and no one cares a hoot ?
Message.Msg: Madoff type Ponzi schemes only last so long even if you change the name from Madoff to Bernanke .

Topic.Title: News came out for International Business Machines Corporation

Message.Msg: That's normal in a "kids" market . They have to keep the kids interested even though the stock is likely to crash down towards its book value of -$9.50 when everyone starts to realise that its game over for any stock when their revenue stream starts shrinking like IBM's is .

Topic.Title: High Un-employment, No Growth, Massive Deficits...

Message.Msg: Whether you're rich or not, it doesn't help America to raise taxes so high that it runs all of our investment capital out of the country or into tax shelters. American investment capital holed up in Singapore doesn't help joe six-pack get a job in Topeka Kansas. If corporations and wealthy americans were applying their capital here instead of sitting on it out of fear of Obama's promises to punish them, we wouldn't be looking at 8.3% unemployment. If Obama weren't spending on government programs like a drunken sailor, we wouldn't be looking at $1.2 Trillion federal deficits. This is lunacy... the last 4 years make another 4 years of Obama look scary as H**l to me!

Topic.Title: News came out for International Business Machines Corporation

Message.Msg: So how much you lose in that last negative position you took on IBM?? Still fixated on that book value thingie, eh? Like I said before, good thing you didn't invest in a "high book value" stock like Government Motors before its fall..... As always,,,,, HAR!!!!

Topic.Title: High Un-employment, No Growth, Massive Deficits...

Message.Msg: Not as scary as previous regime. You come on this board with FUD of current administration, and do not provide information on previous or future GOP administrations. The GOP has not been friendly to our GDP or stock market. Do not get me wrong, as Obama has not fulfilled many of his promises. But, the devil you know... http://www.bea.gov/newsreleases/national/gdp/gdp_glance.htm
